#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int count=0;
long long int find_count(long long int l,long long int n){
    
	if (l != n) {
         	long long int m = (l+n)/2;   
         	find_count(l, m);
         	find_count(m+1, n);
         	count+=2;
     	} 	
    return count;
}
int main()
{
	long long int tc;
	cin>>tc;
	while(tc--){
		long long int ans=0;
		long long int n,l=1;
		cin>>n;
		
		cout<<(2*n)-1<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
